nodes.text: Milon Lenwith was a human male who served as a lieutenant in the Sith Eternal military. He served in the war between the First Order and the Resistance, forming part of the crew of the Derriphan.

Milon Lenwith was played by Jacob Fortune-Lloyd in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, the final installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. In the movie credits, the character is listed as "Sith Fleet Officer."
